game.title: My first game
game.synopsis: A farmer named Carl was struggling to feed his family.
game.beginning: Carl was on his deathbed and asked his son to plant their land with new crops and give his family a better life, but now they’re hungry. Carl died that evening, but his wife and children mourned with no food to eat.
game.ending: Many years later, Carl’s son and his family are happy. Carl’s land bears enough crops to feed Carl’s big family and even a few extra mouths in the village. Carl’s wife is also content, knowing her children have enough to eat and a good life.
